metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35827 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.3.8. A use-after-freewas found in ravb_remove in drivers/net/ethernet/renesas/ravb_main.c.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
